title: The Kardashians | A Kardashian Year-in-Review with Page Six's Francesca Bacardi (NEW EPISODE) | 5
description:
Kim can’t stop dropping F-bombs. Kourtney can’t keep it in her pants on Instagram. And was Khloé secretly engaged to Tristan Thompson? Page Six writer Francesca Bacardi joins Brooke and Aricia to talk all that and so much more in this year-in-review of all things Kardashian. From Kylie’s hiding out after her Astroworld appearance to Pete Davidson’s infamous selfie while in bed with Kim, and what to expect from the Kardashian’s new Hulu series, Francesca sorts facts from fiction.


Check out Francesca’s Page Six reporting here.


Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. https://wondery.app.link/eventherich
